text: Smriti Biswas is an Indian actress. She has worked in many Hindi and Bengali movies. ==Filmography== # Sandhya As a child artist (Bengali Movie) (1930) # Ragini (1947) # Nek Dil # Kaise Bhulu # Mukti # Chitgaon # Aparajita # Abhimaan # Anurag # Jaban Bandi # Suhan # Aaraju # Hamsafar # Hamdard # Baap Re Baap # Bhagam Bhag # Daaka # Maryada # Taj # Talwar # Modern Girl # Ek Aurat # Nai Bhabhi # Arab Ka Saudagar # Yahudi Ki Ladki (1957 film) # Delhi Ka Thug # Chandni Chowk (film) # Neel Akasher Neechey ==References== Category:Living people Category:Actresses in Hindi cinema Category:Bengali people Category:Indian film actresses Category:Actresses from Kolkata Category:21st-century Indian actresses Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Smriti Biswas
